```{r}
json <-
'[
  {"Name" : "Mario", "Age" : 32, "Occupation" : "Plumber"}, 
  {"Name" : "Peach", "Age" : 21, "Occupation" : "Princess"},
  {},
  {"Name" : "Bowser", "Occupation" : "Koopa"}
]'
```

```{r}
mydf <- fromJSON(json)
```

```{r}

```


```{r}
df <- read_json(paste0("https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/rest/pug_view/data/compound/6618",
                       "/JSON/?response_type=save$response_basename=CID_6618"))
df <- df$Record$Section
```

```{r}
df <- toJSON(df)
df <- fromJSON(df)
```
